import React, { createContext, useState } from 'react' import './navbar.css' import logo from '../assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const Cart_amount = createContext(0); export const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu] = useState("Shop"); const numberOfItems = 0; return (

SHOPPER

  • { setMenu(e.target.outerText)}}>Shop{menu =="Shop"?
    :<>}
  • { setMenu(e.target.outerText)}}>Men{menu =="men"?
    :<>}
  • { setMenu(e.target.outerText)}}>Women{menu =="women"?
    :<>}
  • { setMenu(e.target.outerText)}}>Kids{menu =="kid"?
    :<>}
{numberOfItems}
) }
